pkgmetadata.longdescription: Soil Iron Oxides via Diffuse Reflectance // Calculate the ratio of iron oxides, hematite and goethite, in soil using the diffuse reflectance technique. The Kubelka-Munk theory, second derivative analysis, and spectral region amplitudes related to hematite and goethite content are used for quantification (Torrent, J., Barron, V. (2008) doi:10.2136/sssabookser5.5.c13). Additionally, the package calculates soil color in the visible spectrum using Munsell and RGB color spaces, based on color theory (Viscarra et al. (2006) doi:10.1016/j.geoderma.2005.07.017).
